amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding, by offset, for the United States Customs and Border Protection Salaries and Expenses account by $125 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 128 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funds (by transfer) to the United States Customs and Border Protection Salaries and Expenses by $125 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 327 (Roll no. 475).
